verbs: Engaging... reluctantly

Set phasers to stun... again
Warp factor nine... eventually
Red alert... as usual
Resistance is futile. So is optimism.
He's dead, Jim. Again.

Fascinating... in a concerning way
The needs of the many... are ignored as usual
Space, the final frontier... full of problems
To boldly go... and probably get lost
There are four lights! ...I think
Sensors detecting anomaly... of course
Shields up! Not that it helps
Transporter room standing by... for once
All hands, battle stations... here we go again
Course laid in... hopefully the right one

Logic dictates this won't work
Your distinctiveness will be added... unfortunately
